title: AI-Powered Code Review Agent
blurb: Led research and rollout of AI merge request review agent with 82% time reduction
description: Led the complete lifecycle of an AI-powered merge request review agent, from research and testing to production rollout. Partnered cross-functionally with engineering and DevOps teams to integrate the solution into the CI pipeline. Achieved remarkable results with 82% reduction in time to approve and 24% reduction in cycle time, significantly improving developer productivity.
tech: GenAI, CI/CD, DevOps, Ruby on Rails

title: High-Volume Service Architecture
blurb: Developed critical services handling ~2000 requests per minute
description: Architected and developed mission-critical backend services capable of handling ~2000 requests per minute with high reliability and low latency. Implemented robust error handling, monitoring, and scaling strategies to ensure 99.9% uptime. Used modern containerization and orchestration technologies for deployment.
tech: Ruby on Rails, Docker, Kubernetes, Microservices

title: WebRTC Image Quality System
blurb: Architected image quality scoring system for vehicle damage assessment
description: Architected and led development of an innovative image quality scoring system integrated with WebRTC for capturing high-quality vehicle damage images. Created a reusable Node.js package with React components for WebRTC video capturing, currently used by multiple applications and receiving ~21 downloads per month.

title: Legacy System Migration
blurb: Engineered migration from legacy systems to modern email service with GraphQL
description: Led the complex migration of legacy email systems to modern, scalable architecture. Implemented GraphQL to enhance API functionality and improve developer experience. Managed the transition without service interruption while improving performance and maintainability. Included comprehensive documentation and team training.
